[1/29/25, 7:07:09â€¯PM] Mahnoor Ahmed GD: Hey everyone,

I wanted to take a moment to share that I am stepping down from my role as the administrator of our DataCamp community. After a year and a half of dedication to this initiative, itâ€™s a bittersweet moment for me.

Building this space alongside all of you has been an incredibly fulfilling journey. From curating learning opportunities to ensuring that every member had access to valuable resources, Iâ€™ve always strived to make this community a supportive and enriching environment. Seeing so many of you grow, collaborate, and make the most of this platform has been the biggest reward.

As I step away, the administration of DataCamp operations will now be handled by Umer Noor and Sualeha Junaid. I hope you continue to engage, learn, and make the most of this community under their guidance.

While I may no longer be managing things on the admin side, I truly hope the spirit of this community continues to thrive. Thank you to everyone who made this experience so meaningfulâ€”Iâ€™ve learned just as much from you as you have from DataCamp! Wishing you all continued success in your learning journeys.

This isnâ€™t goodbye, just a change of roles. Keep learning and keep growing! 

Best,
Mahnoor
